com.ireasoning.core.jmx
Class AdaptorServer

java.lang.Object
  com.ireasoning.core.jmx.AdaptorServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdaptorServerMBean, Service, ServiceMBean, State, java.lang.Runnable, javax.management.MBeanRegistration
Direct Known Subclasses:
SnmpAdaptorServer, TL1AdaptorServer
public abstract class AdaptorServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdaptorServerMBean, java.lang.Runnable, javax.management.MBeanRegistration

Abstract base class of JMX adaptor
